text:
Hello!!!!! can anyone help me determine if it's possible to create a script in HubSpot to determine which products to send via email?

What I would like is to be able to send emails with products to my clients, but first, I'd like to match the tags of my products with the tags associated with the deal. This way, I can send personalized emails with products.

Hi!
Does programmable email content only pull in contact data or would deal data work?
Any object data works, including multiple objects <@U05A5G5QVP1>
